targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  value
FROM device_data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND
  device = $device
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  device AS metric,
  value AS "Online"
FROM device_data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp
